locale.message: This plugin enables integration and management of the VG Wort pixel tags in OMP. Requires the VG Wort publisher account and the configuration of the plugin settings.

This plugin enables integration and management of the VG Wort pixel tags in OMP. The system requirements are not fulfilled. Please ensure that PHP 5 >= 5.0.1, PHP Soap and OpenSSL extension modules are available on the server.
Please do the following setup steps to be able to manage and use VG Wort pixel tags in OMP:
Enter the VG Wort publisher username and passwort that will be used for the VG Wort services authentication: order, check, registration and statistics of the pixel tags.
Select the editors that will be allowed to use the VG Wort services and to manage the pixel tags in OMP.

Define the minimal amount of available pixel tags (max. 10). If the minimum of the available pixel tags is reached, the selected editors will be notified by an email and reminded to order new pixel tags.
The minimum of the available pixel tags
The VG Wort username is required.
The VG Wort password is required.
The minimum of the available pixel tags is required and should be a number from 1 to 10.
Please enter publication formats that shall NOT get a VG Wort counter.
Please enter a valid card number (2-7 numbers).
The VG Wort card number is required for all authors that should take part in the payout of royalties.

Be aware: Once assigned, a pixel tag can not be unassigned any more!
Ensure that the VG Wort card number exists for all participants that should take part in the payout of royalties, select the appropriate text type and press the button to assign a pixel tag to the submission.
(Default and text - the submission text has to contain more than 1800 characters; poem - less than 1800 characters)
Once assigned, the pixel tag can not be unassigned from the text any more! Are you sure you want to assign a pixel tag to the text?
The VG Wort tracking starts as soon as the submission is published. To stop the VG Wort tracking remove the pixel tag.
This will remove the pixel tag from the galleys and thus disable the VG Wort tracking. Are you sure you want to remove this pixel tag?
The pixel tag has been removed from the galleys, thus VG Wort tracking can't take place. To enable the VG Wort tracking reinsert the pixel tag.
This will insert the pixel tag in the galleys and thus enable the VG Wort tracking again. Are you sure you want to reinsert this pixel tag?
Are you sure you want to delete this pixel tag?
Note: Please don't forget to insert the VG Wort card numbers for authors.
